land  and  preventing  the  defendants  evicting  them  from  the  said

column1: defendants  were  two  of  the  vendors  who  had  purportedly  sold

column2: Petitioner. This  is  an  important fact which establishes that the Respondent was in  possession  of
the land in dispute at least one year prior to the date when information was filed. The  Petitioner

column1: failed to establish that he took over possession  of the land in  dispute thereafter.

column2: On a careful reading of the evidence, I am of the view that the learned High Court Judge correctly

column1: concluded  that there are  no exceptional  circumstances to interfere with the assessment  of the
evidence made by the learned Magistrate.
